Text.Name: WorkPlace
Text.ThingName: ที่สร้างอุปกรณ์เริ่มต้น
Text.Desc: Does not require any materials, just an area on the ground to make simple tools.

Text.Name: MaterialWorkPlace
Text.ThingName: ที่แปรรูปเบื้องต้น
Text.Desc: Does not require any materials, just an area on the ground to process simple materials.

Text.Name: Bonfire
Text.Desc: A simple source of fire built from firewood that can bring light and heat to its surroundings. It can also be used for simple cooking.

Text.Name: StoneMaker
Text.ThingName: โต๊ะสลักหิน
Text.Desc: A work station used to polish stone blocks into stone bricks.

Text.Name: WeaponMaker
Text.ThingName: โรงตีเหล็ก
Text.Desc: A work station used to forge metal bars into different weapons.

Text.Name: Furnace
Text.Desc: A work station used to smelt ores into metal bars.

Text.Name: TextileTable
Text.Desc: A work station used to make fabric by weaving yarn or thread.

Text.Name: TailorTable
Text.ThingName: โต๊ะตัดเย็บ
Text.Desc: A work station used to make clothes.

Text.Name: WoodShed
Text.ThingName: ที่แปรรูปไม้
Text.Desc: A work station used to process wood into Timber. It can greatly facilitate the efficient usage of wood.

Text.Name: MillStone
Text.Desc: A work station used to grind grain into powder for storage. It can facilitate the efficient use of grain.

Text.Name: HandWorkTable
Text.ThingName: โต๊ะประดิษย์
Text.Desc: สำหรับสร้างอุปกรณ์ต่าง ๆ ที่สามารถสร้างด้วยมือได้

Text.Name: Well
Text.Desc: A source of water. Well water is more sanitary than water from the wilderness, and so is less likely to carry disease.

Text.Name: MedicineTable
Text.Desc: A work station used to make medicine.

Text.Name: Building_YiTui
Text.ThingName: ร่างของผู้อมตะ
Text.Desc: ร่างมนุษย์ที่ถูกทิ้งไว้โดยผู้อมตะที่จุติไปแล้ว

Text.Name: Building_YiTui1
Text.Desc: ร่างมนุษย์ที่ถูกทิ้งไว้โดยผู้อมตะที่จุติไปแล้ว
